text: Masali kasone, ki ʙa coji Alloh taolo dustone [az sangu cuʙ va murdagonro ʙa unvoni safoatgar] ʙaroi xud ʙarguzidaand, hamcun masali ankaʙut ast, ki xonai [ʙedavomro panohgohi xes] ʙarguzidaast va ʙe tardid, susttarin xonaho xonai ankaʙut ast. Agar [musrikon in haqiqatro] medonistand, [ʙuthoro ʙa parastis namegiriftand]
